g.text: Hey, want to discuss the project?
Sure! Should we add the team?
Hey Mike! Glad you could join
As a user, I need to add people to a DM to create a group discussion.
Original participants retain full message history after upgrade.
Owner can remove members; any member can leave voluntarily.
Key rotation ensures removed members can't decrypt new messages.
Owner must transfer ownership before leaving the group.
Owner can also delete the entire group if needed.
Members see group metadata and member list with roles.
New members see placeholder text for pre-join messages.

svg.text: group creation | member management | admin roles | message threading
